channel.title: I need a hand :)
channel.description: I fancy starting work on MTP V2, if anyone hasn't seen it it's on the first page of the Downloads. I fancy giving it a tester and see what I can do to it, the only problem is I can't seem to compile because of my compiler not working for this server type, and I was wandering if anyone can help me out with this? Thanks :D

item.title: I need a hand :)
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I figured it out before anyone posted lots of fiddling thanks anyway

Read full topic

item.title: I need a hand :)
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I’m useing this Source too, it’s great but I fixed a couple errors, anyway back on Topic, right click on Compiler and whatever your ClassPath Java is then you add it, for example:

As you can see jdk1.6.0_20 <- change that to your ClassPath.

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: I need a hand :)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

@echo off title Bobby's Compiler echo Compiling now... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

change the 1.6.0_19 to your java type. the latest is 1.6.0_21 I think.

Read full topic
